name: Styx (Rubiia, Caladrius)
description:
"You awake to a strange sight. The world around you is dark: oh so very dark. You attempt to reach out, but there is nothing ahead of you. You take a deep breath and try not to panic as you look out in the ocean of darkness. Everything is so dark and so....

Empty."

Tasked with assisting the Gods of Olympus and the Underworld by Charon: you assume the role of a mortal deciding where Lost Souls are to end up after their deaths. Send them to the Heavenly fields of Elysium; the Underworld of Hades; or the Darkest depths of the Titan's Prison: Tartarus. 

Everyone has a story that the write through their actions in their lives, and it is up to you to decide how that story finally comes to an end...

Will you follow the teachings of Charon and dutifully conduct your work; or will you side with the Gods and further their agenda? 

The Choice is yours...

Features:

3 Different Endings for you to uncover.

Entirely Hand-drawn character Sprites.

Ghostly sprites, whose appearance is procedurally generated to be unique to each playthrough.

Controls:

E to interact/progress dialogue

WASD for movement

Left Click to interact with menus/Your Map
